attributes.action: Ban gender ideology from being taught in schools.
attributes.additional_details: It is not based on facts and kids should be taught facts in school, not ideologies that have detrimental effects on kids. A man does not and will not ever know what it "feels" like to be a woman, and a woman will never know how it "feels" like to be a man. The same goes with kids.
attributes.background: Ban gender ideology from being taught in schools.

rejection.details:
The Education Act 1996 already requires schools to prohibit the promotion of partisan political views in the teaching of any subject in the school.

If you are concerned about teaching in your area you could raise your concerns with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, by entering your post code here: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
